languages.text: "Я в тебе не сомневалась, {name}. Император защищает".
"I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."
languages.original_text: "Я в тебе не сомневалась, {name}. Император защищает".

languages.text: “我从来都没怀疑过你，{name}。愿帝皇保佑。”
languages.original_text: "I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: “我从来都没怀疑过你，{name}。愿帝皇保佑。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前を疑った事は一度もない、{name}。皇帝が守ってくださるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: 「お前を疑った事は一度もない、{name}。皇帝が守ってくださるだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Nunca dudé de usted, {name}. El Emperador protege».
languages.original_text: "I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca dudé de usted, {name}. El Emperador protege».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich habe nie an Euch gezweifelt, {name}. Der Imperator schützt uns."
languages.original_text: "I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nie an Euch gezweifelt, {name}. Der Imperator schützt uns."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais douté de vous, {name}. Que l'Empereur vous protège. »
languages.original_text: "I never doubted you, {name}. The Emperor protects."

languages.text: "Senden hiç şüphe etmemiştim zaten {name}. İmparator korur."
